title: Customers Told To Engage Electricity Distribution Companies (NERC - Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission)
text: ( Source : NERC - Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission ) 14.10.15 - 41 Concerned by communication gap between electricity service providers and their customers, Chairman, Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission (NERC), Dr Sam Amadi ,
